document.docAuthor: Razowski, Józef, Aarvik, Leif & Prins, Jurate De
document.docTitle: Fulcrifera cynicopis Razowski & Aarvik & Prins 2010, comb. n.

heading.emphasis:
Fulcrifera cynicopis ( Meyrick, 1939 )
, comb. n. ( Figs 49 , 88 , 115 )

subSubSection.paragraph:
Laspeyresia cynicopis Meyrick, 1939
. Institut des Parcs nationaux du Congo belge 14: 11. Brown 2005 . World Catalogue of Insects 5: 273 (unplaced species). syn. nov. (see hereafter)
Laspeyresia periculosa Meyrick, 1913
. Annals of the Transvaal Museum 3(4): 280.
Fulcrifera periculosa , Brown 2005
, World Catalogue of Insects 5: 347. Razowski & Krüger 2007 , SHILAP, Revista de

.

Remarks. Described from 11 specimens of which six are in the collection of RMCA ( 3♂ , 2♀ , and one of unknown gender). The lectotype was selected by Aarvik in 1998 but was not published until the present paper.
Laspeyresia cynicopis
is a junior subjective synonym of
Fulcrifera periculosa
. Comparison with Razowski & Krüger's (2007) figure of the male genitalia of
periculosa
with the male genitalia of
cynicopis
shows that the two are conspecific.
